    Reference

    Time series processing

    load_s2paths()

    Load raster paths or data cube from a sen2r archive

    extract_s2ts()

    Extract time series from sen2r archives

    smooth_s2ts()

    Filter and smooth time series from sen2r archives

    fill_s2ts()

    Fill not equally-spaced time series

    Phenological fitting and extraction

    fit_curve()

    Fit curve over cycles

    extract_pheno()

    Extract phenological metrics

    cut_cycles()

    Cut cycles

    assign_season()

    Filter phenological cycles

    aggregate_pheno()

    Temporally aggregate time series values

    Accessory functions

    scl_weights()

    Build SCL weights

    Classes and methods

    s2ts() as.s2ts()

    Class s2ts

    plot(<s2ts>)

    Plot s2ts object

    Sample data

    samplecrops

    Boundaries of the sample crops used in the vignette "The sen2rts workflow"

    sampleroi

    Sample areas used in documentation examples

    sample_paths()

    Paths of the rasters used in documentation examples

    ts_raw

    Sample raw time series

    ts_smoothed

    Sample smoothed time series

    ts_filled

    Sample daily time series

    cf

    Sample curve fitting interpolation

    dt_cycles

    Sample seasonal cycles

    dt_pheno

    Sample phenological metrics dataset
